title: Woman in the Dark 1934 (Film-Noir, Crime) Fay Wray, Ralph Bellamy, Melvyn Douglas | 4K

sources.title: Woman in the Dark 1934 (Film-Noir, Crime) Fay Wray, Ralph Bellamy, Melvyn Douglas | 4K
sources.description:
When the past catches up, love becomes the ultimate escape.
A recently released prisoner lives alone in his cabin so that his bad temper wonâ€™t get him back in any more trouble, but his peaceful existence is disrupted when a mysterious woman arrives.
From the book "Woman in the Dark", by Dashiell Hammett.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/sT9e76-RPik


Original title: Woman in the Dark (1934) AKA: Woman in the Shadows
This film is subtitled in many languages.

Director: Phil Rosen
Writers: Dashiell Hammett, Sada Cowan, Charles Williams
Stars: Fay Wray, Ralph Bellamy, Melvyn Douglas, Roscoe Ates
Genres: Crime, Drama, Film Noir, Literary


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)

24:00 A woman's past catches up with her leading to a desperate escape with a man involved in a criminal situation.
36:02 A woman seeks refuge with friends after a criminal incident, leading to unexpected twists and turns.
39:05 Summary of a 1934 film involving a woman, jewelry, and a lawyer, leading to a chase and confrontation.
